database.name: VIEW ALMAC_CRM_NOM_COMERCIAL
database.view: SELECT p.m_product_id AS almac_crm_nom_comercial_id, p.ad_client_id, p.ad_org_id, p.isactive, p.created, p.createdby, p.updated, p.updatedby, p.m_product_id, p.value AS sku, p.em_almac_nombre_origen AS nombre_origen, p.name AS nombre_comercial, p.name2 AS nombre_real, p.value AS sku_interno, p.sku AS sku_arca, p.description AS descripcion, area.name AS area, color.name AS color, p.em_almac_p_revisado AS producto_revisado, aplicacion.name AS aplicacion, cat.name AS tipo_piedra, uso.name AS uso_recom, COALESCE(NULL, '') AS imagen FROM (SELECT p.m_product_id, p.ad_client_id, p.ad_org_id, p.isactive, p.created, p.createdby, p.updated, p.updatedby, p.value, p.name, p.name2, p.em_almac_nombre_origen, p.description, p.sku, p.em_almac_p_revisado, p.em_dmprod_color_id, p.em_almac_aplicacion_id, p.em_dmprod_areauso_id, p.em_almac_uso_recom_id, p.em_almac_cat_piedra_id FROM m_product p WHERE p.isactive = 'Y' AND p.ad_client_id = '0BD13E24E0F94596B61414BD72225EB8' AND (upper(p.em_dmprod_tileoslab) IN ('TILE', 'SLAB'))) p LEFT JOIN dmprod_color color ON color.dmprod_color_id = p.em_dmprod_color_id LEFT JOIN almac_aplicacion aplicacion ON aplicacion.almac_aplicacion_id = p.em_almac_aplicacion_id LEFT JOIN dmprod_areauso area ON area.dmprod_areauso_id = p.em_dmprod_areauso_id LEFT JOIN almac_uso_recom uso ON uso.almac_uso_recom_id = p.em_almac_uso_recom_id LEFT JOIN almac_cat_piedra cat ON cat.almac_cat_piedra_id = p.em_almac_cat_piedra_id
